perc - Variable in class simulation.mmsolve.funcForHomotopy
Percentage of how much of the magnetic moment of the flipped spin is in the previous orientation and how much is in the next orientation.
power(GenericDenseStore<ComplexNumber>, int) - Static method in class simulation.montecarlo.CrystalField
matrix power (no special technique is used for this so it should not be used for very high powers)
prevBIndices - Variable in class simulation.montecarlo.singleSpin
first array contains the last indices of the local field (x,y,z) == (2,1,0) in the FieldTable second array is used to track whether consecutive calls (to find magneticMoment or energy) are correlated (separately for x,y,z) with 1 indicating correlation and 0 indicating otherwise.
primitiveLatticeVectors - Static variable in class simulation.montecarlo.Constants
An array containing the three primitive lattice vectors of the Bravais lattice
